title: skin for every champ :D
body:
Recently i just got the achievement of owning a skin for every champ, yes EVERY CHAMP. just want to know if anyone else has managed to do this. and also what you think about riot possibly adding in game achievements, and weekly/daily server wide achievements, that say put a skin on sale, just like ocean week did.

riperino DFG. :C

replies.body: haha i play basically only ranked and aram. because my friends are noobs and cant get good so i cant duo with them. XD
Then make friends in your MMR?
Anyone who played since beta (or just bought a copy of the disc for the code) and has ever been in an official Riot Games sponsored tournament will possibly own ALL skins, and I mean ALL.
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwGQTaEEmy3R9n2_lJ0jB8A check this guys beat league thing. you could say he has a lot of skins
That actually sounds like a great way to play the game. Very Roulette, but still.

I have skins for every champ. Collected most summoner icons. Collected most ward skins. I have every skin for Anivia on two accounts (including the original team spirit Anivia back when it was first released), I have both refer a friend skins as well. I have every skin for lee sin, annie, jarvan, thresh, janna, blitzcrank, alistar (cept black). PAX Skins. The works. FK Keyori.
Pretty sure Keyori spends his swag dollars on RP.
On an account that i sadly don't have access to anymore i managed to buy every skin and every champion that was available in the Store.
im awaiting for me achievement of own at least HALF of the champions
Waste of money unless you play the champion.
